project_descr: Living conditions in the Palestinian Gatherings in Lebanon that host Palestinian and Syrian refugees from Syria, improved through better access to basic urban services and shelter conditions.

outputs.output_descr: Living conditions and trust in Palestinian and Lebanese surrounding communities improved
donor_name: US Department of State, Office to monitor & combat Tracking in persons.
